metadata.name: Fantasy Fabrications #1
metadata.description:
iStern's "Fantasy Fabrications" is a captivating abstract art series that explores the convergence of digital and analogue elements of our modern world. By melding digital objects like ads, graphics, memes, and AI-generated images, iStern crafts an intriguing parallel reality that's deeply rooted in our time yet enticingly otherworldly. Inspired by contemporary art's socio-creative backdrop and modern cyber fiction, the series reflects the style, detail, and animation of our era. iStern's approach encourages independent thought, sparking curiosity and new interpretations. 

The collection has been developed with the help of [NFTMASTERS](https://nftmasters.pro/), a team of experts in art, culture, finance, technology, and law.
